hero_bio: Passionate about designing clean, efficient, and scalable solutions. I adapt quickly to new environments and enjoy collaborating in multidisciplinary teams.
about_text: Full Stack Developer trained in Software Engineering at the National University of Loja. With a solid command of Python, JavaScript (React/Node.js), and Java. I seek to apply my skills to create technology that adds value and solves complex problems. My experience in academic and personal projects has given me a solid foundation in agile methodologies and version control with Git.
contact_text: I am currently open to new opportunities. If you have a project in mind or think I could be a good fit for your team, feel free to contact me.
